cpou_token_info: In order to generate an Openstack token, please provide the user's password {{ username }}.
cpou_token_error: Oops. We were unable to generate the OpenStack token.
cpou_token_title_information: Please make a note of this token. You will not be able to access it again.
cpou_token_xauthtoken: The OpenStack token that enables you to identify your HTTP requests (X-Auth-Token) is:
cpou_token_xauthtoken_guide: Find an example in this guide.
